transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan, namaste. Main Belwood Papers Private Limited ka director bol raha hun.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Mujhe aap logon se complaint team se baat karna hai. Complaint raise yahan pe hota hai.
Executive: Ji ji, bataye sir.
Customer: Mere sath ek fraud hua gaya hai. Mere wahan pe teen companies registered hain. Hmm hmm. Acche se suniyega. Belwood Papers,
Customer: Baglamukhi Industries aur Shubhodra Commercial karke.
Hmm hmm. To Belwood Papers mein ye bola gaya tha ki aapka renewal khatam ho gaya hai. Hmm hmm. Aap phir se paisa deke ye kijiye. Teen log milke call kiye the.
Customer: Himanshu aur koi koi tha do. To bar bar call kar karke bol rahe hain, sir aapka khatam ho gaya hai, jaldi renewal karaiye, renewal karaiye. Par mera do saal aur baki tha.
Customer: Ab mere dimag mein tha nahi, maine renewal kara diya. Baad mein jab dekhte hain, main dekh raha hun ki ye to pichle saal hi ye kiya gaya tha.
Hmm hmm. Phir jhoot bolke aisa hai. To iske against mujhe kuch strict complaint karna hai. Mujhe aap logon ka ek koi high level jo manager hai, unse baat karna hai. Kyunki wohi log ye bhi bolte the, haan main manager hun, main ye hun, woh hun. To ye sab mujhe lag raha hai ki internal fraud chal raha hai.
Executive: Accha. Ji sir, main yahan pe
Customer: Accha accha. Main yahan pe dekh raha hun na, apni company jo hai hai 2029 tak ki service hai apne paas.
Customer: Haan. Thik hai sir. Nahi, mujhe chahiye hi nahi na. Hmm hmm. Maine 24 mein 26 tak liya tha. Ab woh jhoot bolke 29 tak agar aap logon ka ye policies hai ki customer ko pagal banake aap log ye kijiyega.
Hmm hmm. To aise to main service continue nahi karunga. Mujhe mera paisa bhi refund chahiye abhi.
Executive: Accha accha, koi nahi sir.
Executive: To yahan pe main dekh raha hun na, apni 26 service jo 2029 August tak hai. Thik hai sir.
Executive: Baki main ek bar register kar leta hun. Thik hai sir, main aapko Are bhai, 29 tak main kiya hi nahi hun. Woh to fraud karke karwaya gaya hai. Samajh aa raha hai ki nahi?
Executive: Ji sir. Bilkul sahi bol rahe hain sir, bilkul thik bol rahe hain aap. Thik hai sir, to main ek kam karta hun, ek call back arrange karata hun aapka, thik hai sir? Same number. Kisse? Mujhe koi aap logon ke level ke aadmi se baat nahi karna hai. Aap logon ka jo senior management mein ho, unse mujhe baat karna hai.
Executive: Haan haan, bilkul. Ji ji, bilkul sahi bol rahe hain. Thik hai sir. Nahi to main sare service off kar raha hun. Ji ji, bilkul. Main teeno company ka service aaj band kar raha hun. Aur consumer forum mein ulta main complaint karunga. Hmm hmm. Ke aisa fraud ye kiye hain.
Executive: Accha accha. Chaliye thik hai sir, phir main na aap mujhe thoda Kab tak call back arrange kar rahe hain? 10 minute time dijiye sir, 10 aapko sham tak call back chali jayegi. Minimum 10 minute mein ek bar try karta hun. Nahi nahi, sham tak nahi, mujhe abhi call back chahiye 10 minute ke andar mujhe arrange karaiye. Thik hai sir, main try kar raha hun. Thik hai sir. Main try karta hun aapko call back karaunga.
Executive: Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Fraudulent renewal of Belwood Papers subscription.

- Wants to file a strict complaint.

- Wants to talk to a high-level manager.

- Wants a refund for the fraudulent renewal.

- Threatens to discontinue all services.

- Threatens to file a complaint in consumer forum.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to arrange a call back.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will try to arrange a call back.



Alert (If Any):

refund, fraud, complaint, escalation

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, fraud, renewal, complaint, manager, subscription
